alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Marfa Plateau (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 2:18AM CST until January 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Lea County. In Texas, Chinati Mountains, Marfa Plateau and Chisos Basin, and Central Brewster County. * WHEN...From early this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chinati Mountains; Chisos Basin; Marfa Plateau
